string.text: You're finished, you bastards!
The end, we'll get thee!

Hit the bastards!
Let's put them all down!
Put your mind to it!
Everybody ready! Let's go!
Come on, men, it's time to go!
Gather round! Move it, move it, come on!
Guys, one at a time!
Men, get out of the pile now!
Scatter, men, hurry up, hurry up!
You're the one I'm gonna lift! Р­-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ-СЌ
What is it again?
Oh, and what little I'm dead?
Just give me time to eat, will you?
Oh, they told me not to go to the zone, I'm sick of these alarms.
That mine's already gone and I'm just breaking up!
That's it, now let them dry their desks.
Men, we're the best, how are we doing, eh?
We're gonna go shooting. Who's up for it?
We're going shooting. Who's in?
We see the enemy, it's about to start.
We see the enemy, it's about to start!
We see the enemy! Prepare for battle!
We see the enemy! Prepare for battle!
Everybody remember! Fire on my command!
Stand by! Fire on signal!
We're waiting for the signal!
I see them!
I see you're on it!
Yeah, so we're here.
Ha, so we're here!
There, there! I see them!
There, there! I see them!
We got it! We got the spot!
We got it! We got the spot!
The point has been captured!
The point has been captured!
It's all right, the point is secured!
All right, lajure! We've got the point!
Let's go! Get them!
KICK IT!
Fire! Fire!
Boy, you didn't forget about us, did you?
Baren, haven't you forgotten us?
Where the hell are you? Just give me the go-ahead!
Where the hell are you? Give me the lube!
Honey, we're still here! We're waiting for your team!
Honey, we're still here! We're waiting for your team!
It's not gonna end that easily. I'm telling you. They'll come back.
It's not gonna end this way. I'm telling you. There's more to come.
Keep your eyes open, they could turn up at any minute!
Keep your eyes open, they could turn up at any minute!
There may not be anyone, but just check your guns just in case.
There may not be anyone, but just check your guns just in case.
Mate, we're waiting for your signal to attack!
Mate! Waiting for your signal to attack!
We're all set! Waiting for your command!
We're all set! Waiting for your command!
Everyone in position! Waiting for your signal!
Everyone in position! Waiting for your signal!
Whoa! Bollocks, they can see us!
Whoa! Bollocks, they can see us!
Okay, we don't have to hide anymore.
Okay, we don't have to hide anymore.
Shit, I couldn't get a quiet approach!
Shit, I couldn't get a quiet approach!
Men, come in!
Guys, come in! Are you deaf?
Is anyone alive out there? Answer me!
Will you guys listen?
That's where our men don't answer. See if they need help
We can't make contact. Let's see what happened to the men.
Our guys are lost somewhere. Prepare a search response.
Okay, let's go take a look.
Copy that, we're on it!
Oh, I don't feel like scratching around! Good, we'll have a run, of course!
Well, now we're going to give it to them.
Well, now we're gonna kick their arse.
Hey, man! Okay, now I think we're gonna get away with it.
Hey, man! Okay, now I think we're gonna get away with it.
Thanks, mate! Oh, we're gonna kick their arses!
Thanks, mate! Ah, let's beat mine!
That's a big help. Listen, you come to our base, we'll thank you properly.
That'll do it. Listen, you come to our base. We'll thank you properly.
Thanks, man. Check out our base. There's a reward for you there.
Thanks, man. Check out our base. There's a reward for you there.
Thank you very much, if you're ever in the neighbourhood, you're welcome at our base, we'll thank you.
Thank you so much, man! You'll be in it for the long haul! Welcome to our base! We'll thank you!
I don't have to go where I'm not invited.
Don't fuck around where you're not invited.
We got it back, thank God!
We've got it, thank God!
Foolishness, and you can't take us down that easily! A rusty bolt for you!
Foolishness, and you can't take us down that easily! Be rusty!
Gangsters are fucking me! Lad, help me!
The gangsters are pissing! Boy, help!
We're at war with clear skies, help us, we won't be rusty.
We're at war with clear skies, help us, we won't be rusty!
The Dolgovians are all about the lantern. Under the sobey, or they'll shoot us.
The Dolgovians are all about the lantern. Under the sobey, or they'll shoot us.
Stalkin lands a free offence. Join us, let's give them stars!
Stalkin, you are offended by freedom. Come join us, let's give them stars.
Help! Our brother Stalker's warriors are going to kill us!
Help! Vayahi, our brother Stalkywa beats us!
Mate, the monsters are crazy, help me out!
Mate, the monsters are crazy! Help me out!
Hey, man! Help me fight off the stalkers!

Man, there's a zombie that wants him. Help!
Man, Zambakov wants him! Help!
Our people are praising! Where are you?!
Our people are praising! Where are you?!
We can't hold out alone! Hurry up!
We can't hold out alone! Hurry up!
Help us, or it'll be too late!
Help us, or it'll be too late!

We can take a little break.
All right, men, stand down!
Maybe it's not over yet.
Quiet! We'll wait a little longer!
Guys, don't relax!
Stay together! We're waiting!
Well, let's wait a little longer, just to be sure.
Where the hell are you?
Where's he hiding, eh?
He's from the swamp somewhere!
He's not here!
Hey, you! Don't think, you haven't left us yet!
Slenel the dog! Let's find it!
It's okay, you won't get away! We'll find you!
Come on, show yourself! Coward!
Don't hide! You better come out!
You mean where are you hiding? We'll find you!
Let's get him before he gets away!
Come out and don't hide! Die like a man!
That's it, you're dead!
You can't hide from us!
We're gonna cut you down!
Show yourself, show yourself!
YOU'RE A TROOP MAN!
You're dead!
You're dead!
KRAMTA TO YOU!

Man, I'm gonna get you!
Hey, you can't get away!
I'll get you!
You're a freak! You're a dead man! Do you get it?!
You bastard, I'm gonna get you!
Killed a man!
You killed a man!
One of ours is ready!
Our man is down!
Guys, we got a murderer!
We're coming, man! Hold on!
We're coming, man! Hold on!
Hold on, man, just a little bit! We're coming!
Man! Hold on, Just a little bit! We're coming!
Don't worry, bro, we'll be right there!
Don't worry, bro, we'll be right there!
Take that, you bastard!
Relax! We'll all be there!
Do you want me to get the rat? Do you need a hand?
And is it still kicking?
And now you can thank me for not sparing a bullet.
Don't panic, bro. Change what you need to change, doctor.
Don't drift, I've got a first aid kit, I can fix you in a heartbeat.
I'll get you back on your feet, no problem!
Man, over here!
Waaaaaah!
Help me!
That's how you're gonna die, not by a dog's tail!
Come here! Come here!
Somebody give me a hand, will you?
Hey! Somebody!
Oh.

Thanks, man!
Look, well, I, no, glory.
Thank you!
Man, thank you so much.
Thank you!
Guys, someone's mum didn't tell them stealing was wrong. You should get one.
Someone's sticking their nose in where it doesn't belong! That's mine!
Clubbers, our nyachek! Varuga, eh?
There's an arsehole in our drawer!
Oh, man, that's not funny!
There's nothing newer.
MASTER!
Well done!
Now that's like a honey smear.

I'm running out of reefer.

and nobody on the horizon, that's fine, that's good.
Oh, shit. The day's gone down the drain here. No gear, no welds.

We were fighting here in a pack, but exactly beasts, according to the colour of their skins, some of them as they razbonechil, so they will razbonechil, others either guard us from the zone, or the zone from us. Soldiers, damn, also a man to slap them, that you smear.
I could use a good meal. Well, there isn't.
Yeah, I'm in a bad mood, and I'm in a bad mood.
Ah, the wrong kind of loot, the wrong kind of loot. Is it time to call it quits?
Hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo-hoo, yeah. That's how sad it is.
Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.
Fate, no, you can't hide from fate, what's written in your destiny, it will be so.
Newcomers are like dogs nowadays, and they know everything better than old people.

Uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh thm
Oh, I don't feel like going for the loot today. I wish I was in a homo right now with a good book.

Not to learn anything for a while. They don't want to fucking learn. You've seen too many American films or you're greedy. You tell him about the anomalies, and he tells you about the loot. They don't want to think about anything but money. Until their guts are scattered on the branches.

As if I soldiered on, the second time all the profits in a month were taken away with a cat. What do you do for a living if this is the way things are? They sit at their fucking checkpoints and ride us into paradise.
Ah, if only it were always this good. That's if you think of it that way, yeah, right. Three or four hikes like yesterday. If only the loot was as good, and I'm done with the zone.
Yoo-hoo Because over my.. With my head.
Ew, man.

Ugh!
Uuu....
Yes...
Well, yeah.
I'm gonna save up for my house after all, to be by the river and that the shine is near. And no beasts, no bastards, no bastards of any kind.
Ahem!
The centre of the zone, the centre of the zone, the centre of the zone, the centre of the zone, the centre of the zone.

I thought it was only worth it to pass the scorcher, and somewhere behind it there's a clandestine artefact store and a wish-granting machine. A fool, here, a fool, but you know, your idiotic luck, artefacts as it were. Nothing but untravelled paths and unfed creatures.
Not bad, not bad, two night stars in one go, if this keeps up, I've seen your praised klandyke to hell.
The artefacts here are certainly a bit more fattening.
Holy shit. Wow, I saw Pripyat yesterday. Just like that, with my own eyes. I wouldn't have believed it a month ago.
I'm so thirsty. Ah, some cold kvass now. Let's get you back on your feet.
Oh, I wish I had a piece of meat so big that I could curl up, squeaky, juicy.
Concentrates, my arse. Think how it was. You come home at night, and the woman has homemade on the table. One year old.
And the sausage and baton nowadays are lousy.
It's okay, it's okay. It's okay, we'll get through this. I don't smoke the sky for nothing. Me and my mates will get through this.
Again the boot suckers sucked up that they have no conscience at all these in a week goplake soles.
Yeah, I've had worse fire days.
This one's as naked as a sackcloth.
I'm not going into the zone with that kind of stuff, am I?
There's no good to go to waste, I reckon.
All right, man, what you got there?
I'm sorry, but it's no use to you anymore.
It's pretty good.
You were a handy man, man!
It's a rich man's place!
Well, hello there!
Hey, bro!
I'm listening to you!
What do you say?
Tell me about it!
Put the gun down, man!
Don't spoil it! Hide your weapon!
Put the gun away, man!
Hide your weapon!
Fuck the gun!
What's the conversation with the gun? Will hide the sin!
Hmm, hard to negotiate with him, though.
when you learn to talk, come on over.
Go be quiet with someone else.
Yeah, that's the talk.
What, are we gonna play silent treatment?
What do you want? No, he's not talking.
No, I'm not gonna talk to you.
I don't want to talk to you.
I'm not in the mood to talk these days.
What are we talking about now?
Man, are you crazy? I'll talk to you later!
There's three fools shooting, we'll talk afterwards!
If I need anything, I ask the man in charge.
Look, all questions for the man in charge!
There's an older man standing over there, so you talk to him.
First get the gun off your hands, then we can talk.
I don't like talking under the radar, man!
That's not how we're gonna have this conversation. Put the gun away.
Hey, don't use that gun, you don't need it to talk!
Once you hide the gun, we'll talk.
What, you never let go of the gun?
What's the conversation with the gun? Will hide the sin!
weapons removed
Look, I've got Pogorla's department. Speak up!
Do I have to speak for you?
You're stiff, aren't you?
Don't be shy, speak up!
If you have something to say, say it, don't be stupid!
So, anyway, how long are you gonna keep your mouth shut?
Don't sleep, you'll freeze!
Just say the word!
Come on, come on, don't squirm!
I don't get it. Did you mean you didn't?
Oh, for fuck's sake!
From shit!
Don't shoot!
Man, don't shoot!
I'm unarmed! Don't shoot!
Enough! Stop it! Don't!
All right, man, don't shoot!
Aah, ugly!
GET IT!

Get off me, you bastard!
You bastard, get off!

Nice jahabara. Yeah, I'm really good. I'm really good. What do you want to swear by?
They, they, the ears of the herd.
You'll kill me, you'll kill me!
I could use a little extra cash, money's tight.
Come on, show me the goods today, I'll see what I've got enough for.
Show me what you got. I got a little bit of coin.
Listen, I got some good loot. I wish we could do this once a week.
I've been a bit rubbish around here, look.
I've been scraping together a few odds and ends. I've been having bad luck lately.
Here they come!
I just remembered this
Attention, annik-dot!
Like this, does anyone know?
What are you doing here, men?
Listen up, men!
How about this?
That's it, music break.

Two stalkers are sitting in a bar, they've had a good drink and are discussing everyone around them. The laziest are the military. Stalkers are being robbed on the cordon itself. Took away the loot and sold it to Sidorovich 100 metres away. No, and you're wrong. The laziest are the tradesmen. I know a guy who gets up early so he can stay up longer to do nothing.

Anyway, zone, forest, clearing, there's a bloodsucker sitting on the doorstep of an old spinster. Then a little bloodsucker comes running out of the house, and to Daddy brakes him. Dad, Dad, Dad, show me the Stalkers. Dad, show me the Stalkers. The one went in the old lady, comes out with a skull on each arm. And begins, as in puppet theatre, the left skull so subtly. Semyonovich, listen, do you think there are bloodsuckers here? The right one's so bassy, Petrukha. What the hell are bloodsuckers?

A young stalker is walking through the zone. Then, bang, there's a grove, or a small grove, but it's not on the map. Well, green back and forth how to be. And to go with the three, how best to go round, you don't know. Here look to my husband, and some one nearby looms. And he doesn't look like a dolgovian or a mercenary. So, the young man was glad to see him. Well, little man, can you tell me how I can get this grove here? Go round. Someone says I'm going that way too. Let's go together. They're walking nicely, walking quietly. The young one got bored, so he starts sucking up. So, it's nice to be, like, a gritty stalker. Don't be afraid of every rustle, don't carry a lot of weapons. The man really didn't have a gun. So he starts laughing. Who's there to be afraid of? Who does the young one wonder? Well, it's the monsters, the controllers alone. The man's so quiet and says, offended. You're a fool. I'd say zombie or bloodsucker, but that's what we are. Controllers, why call them monsters?

A black stalker appeared in the zone. He came to the camp at night, and there he put his hand into the tent, and said... Vodecka, win! And if you throw a flask on the dashek or go outside, you'll get killed. And one time, a bloke decided to make a joke. Crawled quietly out of the tent, put on a leather glove and went to my neighbours' tent. So he's begging and begging pathetically. Vodka, vodka to drink! And then a hand comes out of the tent towards him because of his throat. And such a husky voice comes out quietly. What do you need my water for?

Stalker was once captured by Stalker's mercenaries. We went to the well, dunked him head down waist-deep. After a minute, they pull it out and ask. "Got any artefacts Dough?" He told them "no." Drops it again, pulls it out, asks. "Got any artefacts Dough?" No, I don't! Dunked again and asked again. "Got any artefacts Dough?" Well, you couldn't take it. Shit, you either go deeper or hold it longer. But they're cloudy and you can't see shit.

The experienced Stalker returns to his jeep. There's a supervisor hanging around. Stalker, get out of here while you're still in one piece. The controller took offence, well, are you stupid or what? I've needed your wreck for ages. And Stalker into his fire, I said, get out. You can steal, you tell me, but scribbling some nonsense you will.

The old young ones are walking through the zone. Suddenly the old one stops and says in a whisper to the young one. Go quietly to that tree over there. Tadpole crawled on tiptoe, sweating. I got there and my hands are showing the molun. What do we do now? He's going to shriek with joy. I told you! Bollocks! Bollocks! What's the anomaly?
One day, the Bloodsucker and the Controller collided under the Agroprom lands. Bloodsucker. You scared me. You monster. Checker, look at you. Well, look at that. Rynz is beautiful.

There's a rookie walking through the zone. He was dreaming, but he didn't see the enemy and he's going down the drain. And downstairs is a meat grinder, well the stalker thinks that's it, goodbye mums. And then he got popped by someone. He sees it's a zombie grabbing him and pulling him, now somewhere. Stalker him and asks him if it's a zombie, thanks for saving him from the meat grinder. Where are you taking me? And the zombie to him. The controller likes fresh meat, mince doesn't like mince. You can't talk to food.

Retired old Stalker, sits himself at the kamen with a handy dog and reads. Greek and Roman mythology Cerberus, a monstrous, three-headed dog with a modified tail that guards the entrance to the underworld. There's a GAF dog! Stalker got excited, behind the barrel immediately cut, and all around all quiet. He goes to the dog, what's up, mate? And that GAF-GAF, GAFNO is your mythology.

Stalker walks into a bar. Bartender, give me something to eat. So the bartender starts. Well, there's an eye of flesh in tomato sauce today. Fried mink feet in tomato sauce. From a bloodsucker fish tentacle in tomato sauce. Stalker's face twisted. What are you doing, he says? Poisoning people? The bartender's a little skewered, too. Who's shouting? Me? Stalker. Why, me? With mushroom sauce, please. What the hell is tomato?

One stalker says to another, and I always take a picture of my mother-in-law with me on a hike. Why? What about it? Cold, mud, anomalies, mutants. And I look at the card and I think, God, this feels good.

Once scientists decided to conduct field trials of a new drug. So we hired a group of stalkers to do the job. A few days go by, one stalker comes to the professor and says. Hey, did you just change my tyres, didn't you? He fixed his glasses and gave him a careful look. Why do you suddenly think the drug has been changed? And stalker, I used to throw pills in a puddle and they'd sink. And now all of a sudden they're swimming.
Brought one of the puppies to the zone once, to show something how. Some things surprised him, some things angered him, and some things were stolen from him.

The stalker planted a pseudorepka, grew a pseudorepka big and pretty, took a stalker grenade launcher and went to extract it. And he would have succeeded if the pseudo-bugs and pseudo-flies hadn't swooped in.

Once Stalker went on a tour to hell. To him the devil shows him the torments that sinners endure. Boiling tarns, red-hot embers, fire all around, bopli, grey stinks. Stalker looks at all this and says to the devils. What's up, dudes? It's dry here, and you've got more fun than we have on the marshes. So I think I'm gonna stay here for a while.
The Doctor listens to Stalker coming in for an appointment and sentences. All right, all right, all right. Doctor, what's good, asks Stalker. Good thing it's not me.

Three stalkers share advice. One of them says, I got myself a black jacket. So now the bandits think I'm one of their own and don't touch me. Second. I dyed my suit to look like an army suit from afar it looks like a bulletproof vest. Third. And I'm wearing an old tattered jumpsuit, and on the back, it says, I'm not lucky, you touch me and my bad luck is passed on to you. So no one comes within 50 metres.

So the stalker came to the doctor. The doctor examines him and says, this is from fatigue, it's from nervous tension, and that's for depression. Thank you, Doctor, thank you. Tell me, do you have nothing but vodka?

Meets stalker his old friend, and here understood all fengal under the eye. Petya, what's wrong with you? Yeah, shit, they attacked me, beat me up, took my money. Do you even remember them? What's there to remember? The wife.

One stalker asks another, do you know what the most stalker car is? No, replies the one who does. Zaporozhets? Why? It's as simple as that! Reliable as a tank. And a boot in the front, so you can keep an eye on your loot.

Stalker and Vayaga, Stalker-soldatum, crossed paths once near the cordon. Where are you scratching? What are you, a man? Fucking hell! That's a military secret! Hey, take it easy, I didn't know! What are you carrying so heavy? All sweaty. Oh, man, you're gonna get in a fight. Those armour-piercing rounds are going to the warehouse.

Stalker hid Khabar in a tree. So one night he decided to check it out. How is everything there, is everything intact? And lo and behold, there's someone sitting there, rustling around, bass feet dangling. Stalker sneaks up and heron that on the tree sits firmly between his legs and strictly so kali under the varnish. Who is he? What group? Silence in reply. But Stalker pressed even harder. Who is he? And he's silent again. But he got angry, Stalker. I squeezed it so hard, it ran down my arm. You hear me, you bastard, I'm gonna rip it all off. Answer me, who is he? Quickly! And from upstairs, this husky, weak voice. I'm the controller. How did you keep him quiet, you bastard? I'm not mine.
You've had it, all right?
Fuck you!
GET IT, MINER!
That's how I need to be!
No, I'm not gonna talk to you.
I don't want to talk to you.
I'm not in the mood to talk these days.
Look, I'm tired, I can't talk!
It's no use talking to you.
What kind of talk is that?
Man, are you crazy? I'll talk to you later!
This is no time to talk!
There's three fools shooting! We'll talk afterwards!
Fuck you for talking!
Um, hey, what's up, middle of the night, huh?
Oh, there, there on the shelf look.

First get the gun off your hands, then we can talk.
